h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master
content: He often follows this up by sending out the three paper talismans that float around his free hand to electrically charge the area in front of him before blasting it with a lightning strike, but by dodging to the side you can score several free hits as he draws out the animation.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master'.
The content is as follows:
He often follows this up by sending out the three paper talismans that float around his free hand to electrically charge the area in front of him before blasting it with a lightning strike, but by dodging to the side you can score several free hits as he draws out the animation.
